text: This is a list of prime ministers of Gabon since the formation of the post of Prime Minister in 1960, to the present day. A total of twelve people have been Prime Minister. ==List of officeholders== Portrait Name Election Term of office Political party President(s) Took office Left office Time in office 1 Léon M'ba 1961 1960 1961 BDG Himself Post abolished (21 February 1961 – 16 April 1975) 2 Léon Mébiame 1980 1985 1975 1990 PDG O. Bongo 3 Casimir Oyé-Mba 1990 1990 1994 PDG O. Bongo 4 Paulin Obame-Nguema 1996 1994 1999 PDG O. Bongo 5 Jean-François Ntoutoume Emane 2001 1999 2006 PDG O. Bongo 6 Jean Eyeghé Ndong 2006 2006 2009 PDG O. Bongo 6 Jean Eyeghé Ndong 2006 2006 2009 PDG Divungi Di Ndinge 6 Jean Eyeghé Ndong 2006 2006 2009 PDG Rogombé 7 Paul Biyoghé Mba 2011 2009 2012 PDG Rogombé 7 Paul Biyoghé Mba 2011 2009 2012 PDG A. Bongo 8 Raymond Ndong Sima — 2012 2014 PDG A. Bongo 9 Daniel Ona Ondo — 2014 2016 PDG A. Bongo 10 Emmanuel Issoze-Ngondet 2018 2016 2019 PDG A. Bongo 11 Julien Nkoghe Bekale — 2019 2020 PDG A. Bongo 12 Rose Christiane Raponda — 2020 2023 PDG A. Bongo 13 Alain Claude Bilie By Nze — 2023 2023 PDG A. Bongo Post vacant (30 August – 7 September 2023) — Raymond Ndong Sima — 2023 2025 Independent Oligui Post abolished (4 May 2025 – present) ==Notes== ==Other websites== *World Statesmen – Gabon *1991 Constitution of Gabon (as amended in 2011) * Gabon Prime Ministers
